VarDataÂ¶

struct asmjit::VarData
#include <compiler.h>

Base variable data.

Public Functions

const char * getName()

Get variable name.

uint32_t getId()

Get variable id.

bool hasContextId()

Get whether the variable has context id.

uint32_t getContextId()

Get context variable id (used only by Context).

void setContextId(uint32_t contextId)

Set context variable id (used only by Context).

void resetContextId()

Reset context variable id (used only by Context).

uint32_t getType()

Get variable type.

uint32_t getClass()

Get variable class.

uint32_t getFlags()

Get variable flags.

uint32_t getPriority()

Get variable priority.

uint32_t getState()

Get variable state (only used by Context).

void setState(uint32_t state)

Set variable state (only used by Context).

uint32_t getRegIndex()

Get register index.

void setRegIndex(uint32_t regIndex)

Set register index.

void resetRegIndex()

Reset register index.

bool isStack()

Get whether the VarData is only memory allocated on the stack.

bool isMemArg()

Get whether the variable is a function argument passed through memory.

bool isCalculated()

Get variable content can be calculated by a simple instruction.

bool saveOnUnuse()

Get whether to save variable when it’s unused (spill).

bool isModified()

Get whether the variable was changed.

void setModified(bool modified)

Set whether the variable was changed.

uint32_t getAlignment()

Get variable alignment.

uint32_t getSize()

Get variable size.

int32_t getMemOffset()

Get home memory offset.

void setMemOffset(int32_t offset)

Set home memory offset.

MemCell * getMemCell()

Get home memory cell.

void setMemCell(MemCell * cell)

Set home memory cell.

VarAttr * getVa()

Get temporary VarAttr.

void setVa(VarAttr * va)

Set temporary VarAttr.

void resetVa()

Reset temporary VarAttr.

Public Members

const char * _name

Variable name.

uint32_t _id

Variable id.

uint32_t _contextId

Context variable id (used by Context only, initially set to kInvalidValue).

uint8_t _type

Variable type.

uint8_t _class

Variable class.

uint8_t _flags

Variable flags.

uint8_t _priority

Variable priority.

uint8_t _state

Variable state (connected with actual BaseVarState).

uint8_t _regIndex

Actual register index (only used by Context), during translate.

uint8_t _isStack

Whether the variable is only used as memory allocated on the stack.

uint8_t _isMemArg

Whether the variable is a function argument passed through memory.

uint8_t _isCalculated

Whether variable content can be calculated by a simple instruction.

This is used mainly by MMX and SSE2 code. This flag indicates that register allocator should never reserve memory for this variable, because the content can be generated by a single instruction (for example PXOR).

uint8_t _saveOnUnuse

Save on unuse (at end of the variable scope).

uint8_t _modified

Whether variable was changed (connected with actual BaseVarState).

uint8_t _reserved0

uint8_t _alignment

Varialbe natural alignment.

uint32_t _size

Variable size.

int32_t _memOffset

Home memory offset.

MemCell * _memCell

Home memory cell, used by Context (initially NULL).

uint32_t rReadCount

Register read access statistics.

uint32_t rWriteCount

Register write access statistics.

uint32_t mReadCount

Memory read statistics.

uint32_t mWriteCount

Memory write statistics.

VarAttr * _va

Temporary link to VarAttr* used by the Context used in various phases, but always set back to NULL when finished.

This temporary data is designed to be used by algorithms that need to store some data into variables themselves during compilation. But it’s expected that after variable is compiled & translated the data is set back to zero/null. Initial value is NULL.

uintptr_t _vaUInt
